ConnectionState.Name: connection_state
ConnectionState.Help: The state of the connection (1 indicates up and 0 indicates down)

ConnectionBpsEgress.Name: connection_bps_egress
ConnectionBpsEgress.Help: The bitrate for outbound data from the AWS side of the connection

ConnectionBpsIngress.Name: connection_bps_ingress
ConnectionBpsIngress.Help: The bitrate for inbound data to the AWS side of the connection

ConnectionPpsEgress.Name: connection_pps_egress
ConnectionPpsEgress.Help: The packet rate for outbound data from the AWS side of the connection

ConnectionPpsIngress.Name: connection_pps_ingress
ConnectionPpsIngress.Help: The packet rate for inbound data to the AWS side of the connection

ConnectionErrorCount.Name: connection_error_count
ConnectionErrorCount.Help: The total error count for all types of MAC level errors on the AWS device

ConnectionLightLevelTx.Name: connection_light_level_tx
ConnectionLightLevelTx.Help: Indicates the health of the fiber connection for outbound traffic from the AWS side of the connection

ConnectionLightLevelRx.Name: connection_light_level_rx
ConnectionLightLevelRx.Help: Indicates the health of the fiber connection for inbound traffic to the AWS side of the connection

ConnectionEncryptionState.Name: connection_encryption_state
ConnectionEncryptionState.Help: Indicates the connection encryption status (1 indicates the encryption is up and 0 indicates the connection is down

VirtualInterfaceBpsEgress.Name: virtual_interface_bps_egress
VirtualInterfaceBpsEgress.Help: The bitrate for outbound data from the AWS side of the virtual interface

VirtualInterfaceBpsIngress.Name: virtual_interface_bps_ingress
VirtualInterfaceBpsIngress.Help: The bitrate for inbound data to the AWS side of the virtual interface

VirtualInterfacePpsEgress.Name: virtual_interface_pps_egress
VirtualInterfacePpsEgress.Help: The packet rate for outbound data from the AWS side of the virtual interface

VirtualInterfacePpsIngress.Name: virtual_interface_pps_egress
VirtualInterfacePpsIngress.Help: The packet rate for inbound data to the AWS side of the virtual interface
